TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlInputHidden extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler
Public Class HtmlInputHidden Inherits HtmlInputControl Implements IPostBackDataHandler
type HtmlInputHidden = class inherit HtmlInputControl interface IPostBackDataHandler

summary.span: 允许对服务器上的 HTML 元素进行编程访问。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 您可以使用 控件嵌入 `
` 元素内用户隐藏的信息。You can use the control to embed information that is hidden from the user within a `` element. 当网页回发到服务器时，将发送此信息。This information is sent when the Web page is posted back to the server. 控件提供 事件，该事件在 属性更改向服务器的各次发送之间的值时引发。The control provides a event that is raised when the property changes values between posts to the server. 这允许您创建一个在每次引发事件时执行一组自定义指令的事件处理程序。This allows you to create an event handler that performs a custom set of instructions each time the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 控件不提供回发到服务器的内置方式。The control does not provide a built-in way to post back to the server. 您必须在支持向服务器发布的网页（如 控件）上提供另一个控件，以便将控件的值发送回服务器。You must provide another control on the Web page that supports posting to the server, such as an control, to send the value of the control back to the server. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 页框架使用此 HTML 功能在页上自动加载和保存服务器控件的视图状态。The ASP.NET page framework uses this HTML feature to automatically load and persist the view state of server controls on a page. 有关 实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件在发送到服务器的过程中存储网页上的信息。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control to store information on the Web page between posts to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputHidden Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputHidden Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputHidden Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputHidden Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 处理 控件的回发数据。

span.span: if the control's state has changed as a result of the postback; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法检查 控件的回发值是否不同于以前的值，如果是，则返回 `true`。The method checks to see whether the postback value of the control is different from the previous value, and if so, returns `true`. 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展 控件的功能。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

span.span: An that contains event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在呈现 控件之前，只需调用 方法。The method is called just prior to rendering the control. 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展 控件的功能。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法，以便它将 HTML 编码应用于自定义 服务器控件中的输入值。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that it applies HTML encoding to the input value in a custom server control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlInputHiddenOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputHiddenOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputhidden_onprerendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlInputHiddenOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputHiddenOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputhidden_onprerendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlInputHiddenOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputHiddenOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputhidden_onprerender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlInputHiddenOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputHiddenOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputhidden_onprerender.vb#2)]

span.span: A that contains event data.
Raises the event.

summary.span: 该方法使您可以直接处理该事件。

span.span: This method allows you to handle the event directly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当服务器上的 属性发生更改时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when the property is changed on the server. > [!NOTE] > 控件必须启用视图状态， 事件才能正常工作。The control must have view state enabled for the event to work correctly. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 在服务器上更改 属性时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property is changed on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当向服务器的各次发送过程中的 属性发生更改时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when the property is changed between posts to the server. > [!NOTE] > 控件必须启用视图状态， 事件才能正常工作。The control must have view state enabled for the event to work correctly. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).
